message: Let's split the money 70/30 in favor of Alice to ensure a fair distribution.
I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I think 70/30 is too unfair. Let's try a 4/1 ratio instead!
I propose a more balanced 60/40 split, aiming for a fairer distribution considering the diminishing value of our offers with each round.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'm willing to compromise. This 9/1 ratio is a decent offer, considering the inflation and the diminishing value of our offers. Take it or leave it!
